NAME

META_FLOODFILL

NEAREST API CALL

#include <windows.h>
BOOL32 FloodFill
(
	HDC32 hdc,
	INT32 x,
	INT32 y,
	COLORREF color
);

DESCRIPTION

U16 Value
0 COLORREF
1
2 y
3 x
At the point x,y FloodFill fills with the color COLORREF in all directions until it meets a border of the same color as COLORREF. see ExtFloodFill

back
